product_name: Timbuk2 Elise Mini Duffel Bag - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Throw the women's Timbuk2 Elise Mini Duffel Bag over your shoulder and head out the door for whatever adventures await. Durable fabric and webbing straps are a hallmark of Timbuk2 bags. External pocket holds your phone. Internal zippered organizer pocket secures small items; key fob clips your keys so you never have to dig for them. The Timbuk2 Elise Mini Duffel Bag features a unique gathered design, refined metal hardware and a printed liner for a quality feel. Closeout.
short_description: Throw the women's Timbuk2 Elise Mini Duffel Bag over your shoulder and head out the door for whatever adventures await.
